INSERT INTO platform_stats (date, total_users, active_users, total_companies, total_chats, total_messages, new_users, new_companies, metrics)
SELECT 
  CURRENT_DATE,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE last_login_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days') as active_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM companies) as total_companies,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chats) as total_chats,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM messages) as total_messages,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE created_at::date = CURRENT_DATE) as new_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM companies WHERE created_at::date = CURRENT_DATE) as new_companies,
  jsonb_build_object(
    'active_sessions', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions WHERE is_active = true),
    'total_backups', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM backups),
    'health_checks_today', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM health_checks WHERE created_at::date = CURRENT_DATE)
  ) as metrics
ON CONFLICT (date) DO UPDATE SET
  total_users = EXCLUDED.total_users,
  active_users = EXCLUDED.active_users,
  total_companies = EXCLUDED.total_companies,
  total_chats = EXCLUDED.total_chats,
  total_messages = EXCLUDED.total_messages,
  new_users = EXCLUDED.new_users,
  new_companies = EXCLUDED.new_companies,
  metrics = EXCLUDED.metrics,
  updated_at = NOW();
